com.esri.mo2.file.sdc
Class IntelBitInputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.file.sdc.IntelBitInputStream
Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated.

public class IntelBitInputStream
extends Object

IntelBitInputStream is subclass of InputStream for reading data in Intel format (LSB), and also supports bit-level reading. IntelBitInputStream may work in two modes: non-block mode, and simple. In non-blocking mode file is not locked between reading operations. If non-blocking mode is on, RandomAccessFile is opened only for filling buffer with new data and then is closed. This mode is for time-to-time reading from file or if correct file closing cannot be performed.
